segments.text: Hello , Sir . You're here to discuss the Network Settlement Service , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's right . We want as much info as possible before we agree to anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's important to be all clued up before you enter into any agreement . To make full use of the Network Settlement Service and take advantage of the whole banking system , we provide internal fund transfers , account inquiry , agency clearing to name but a few .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , do you think our corporation will be eligible for this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and it's extremely simple . All you need to do is make a Network Settlement Agreement with us .
segments.speaker: S1
